plays.text: Penalty to Daymond Langkow 2 minutes for Roughing Shane Willis
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Claude Lemieux
Penalty to Ron Francis 2 minutes for Interference Ossi Vaananen
Penalty to JEFF O'NEILL 2 minutes for High Sticking Daymond Langkow
Penalty to Claude Lemieux 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Claude Lemieux 5 minutes for Elbowing Aaron Ward served by Krystofer Kolanos
Goal scored by Josef Vasicek assisted by Ron Francis and JEFF O'NEILL
